feed.title: Kinto Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Kinto: 22.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Breaking Changes

  • Use explicit seconds suffix for duration metrics by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3539
  • Remove redundant setting introduced in 3c3af9f by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3535

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/compare/21.1.1...22.0.0

entry.title: New release for Kinto: 23.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Breaking Changes

  • Remove status from request_size and request_duration_seconds labels by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3541
  • Downsize the Prometheus histograms to 8 buckets (https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3544)

Bug Fixes

  • Improve Makefile to avoid reinstall on each run by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3545
  • Fixing duplicated prometheus metrics. Resolves remote-settings #872 by @alexcottner in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3546 and https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3542

New Features

  • Fixes #3533: Add ability to disable certain default metrics and adjust buckets by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3544

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/compare/22.0.0...23.0.0

entry.title: New release for Kinto: 23.0.1

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/compare/23.0.0...23.0.1

entry.title: New release for Kinto: 23.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix #3386: set appropriate CSP for attachment previews of images by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3550

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/compare/23.0.1...23.0.2

entry.title: New release for Kinto: 23.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Prevent contains to be executed on arbitrary fields by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3563

Documentation

  • Fix typos in documentation: ResourceReponses → ResourceResponses and … by @KritimPrasadKafle in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3552

Dependency Updates

  • Bump the minor-patch group with 3 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3551
  • Bump the minor-patch group with 3 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3553
  • Update Kinto Admin version to 4.0.1 by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3557
  • Bump requests from 2.32.3 to 2.32.4 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3555
  • Bump the minor-patch group with 3 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3554
  • Update Kinto Admin version to 4.0.2 by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3565
  • Bump the minor-patch group across 1 directory with 6 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3564
  • Bump urllib3 from 2.2.2 to 2.5.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3559

New Contributors

  • @KritimPrasadKafle made their first contribution in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3552

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/compare/23.0.2...23.0.3
